sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <input ref="input" type="tel"
         :value="formattedValue"
         @change="change"
		:placeholder="placeholder"
         v-money="{precision, decimal, thousands, prefix, suffix, allowBlank}"
         class="v-money" />
</template>

<script>
import money from './directive'
import defaults from './options'
import {format, unformat} from './utils'

export default {
  name: 'Money',
  	props: {
  		value: {
  			required: true,
  			type: [Number, String],
  			default: 0
  		},
  		masked: {
  			type: Boolean,
  			default: false
  		},
  		precision: {
  			type: Number,
  			default: () => defaults.precision
  		},
  		decimal: {
  			type: String,
  			default: () => defaults.decimal
  		},
  		thousands: {
  			type: String,
  			default: () => defaults.thousands
  		},
  		prefix: {
  			type: String,
  			default: () => defaults.prefix
  		},
  		suffix: {
  			type: String,
  			default: () => defaults.suffix
  		},
  		allowBlank: {
  			type: Boolean,
  			default: () => defaults.allowBlank
  		},
  		min: {
  			type: Number,
  			default: 0,
  		},
  		max: {
  			type: Number,
  			default: Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER
		},
		placeholder: {
  			type: String,
  			default: ''
  		}
  	},

  	directives: {
  		money
  	},

  	data() {
  		return {
  			formattedValue: ''
  		}
  	},
  	watch: {
  		value: {
  			immediate: true,
  			handler(newValue, oldValue) {
  				var formatted = format(newValue, this.$props)
  				if (formatted !== this.formattedValue) {
  					this.formattedValue = formatted
  				}
  			}
  		}
  	},

  	methods: {
  		change(e) {
  			if (this.masked) {
  				this.$emit('input', this.masked ? e.target.value : unformat(e.target.value, this.precision))
  			} else {
				var val = unformat(e.target.value, this.precision)
  				if (val < parseInt(this.min)) {
  					e.target.value = parseInt(this.min);
  					return;
  				}
  				if (this.max != undefined && val > this.max) {
  					e.target.value = this.max;
  				}
  				this.$emit("input", val);
  			}
		},
		_focus(){
			this.$refs.input.focus();
		},
		_select(){
			this.$refs.input.select();
		}
  	}
}
</script>
